attributes.action: Bring our troops home to help our own Flood Victims
attributes.additional_details:
Our Country is in need of help.
Please bring our troops home from Afghanistan to help our own flood victims.
I think its time now that we started to look after our own people.
Poeple affected by these terrible floods are working around the clock to help each other, they are tired, they cannot manage. If our troops were home it would ease the pressure. Show the people of this country that they actually mean something and that the Government cares.
With more rain on the forecast the flood victims need help immediately.
The Government has the power to withdraw our troops.. Do this, Save our Country now in Our time of Need.
